text_block_list.name: Tucker Bryne
text_block_list.text:
All can be found here, on this abundant 
natural environment plonked in the middle 
of the ocean!

text_block_list.name: Tucker Bryne
text_block_list.text:
A perfect place to get down with some 
hard yet invigorating training!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
A slightly unconventional and 
exciting training site!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
For horsegirls and trainers! 
For you, and for me!

text_block_list.name: Ryan & Chiyo & Tama
text_block_list.text: Do come visit and enjoy yourselves!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Take it from me, sunset's a real treat!

Welcome to the Wilds
